1100010000001010 0000111010011011 0 -> sum: 1101001010100101, cout: 0
0111101001101010 0101011111010111 0 -> sum: 1101001001000001, cout: 0
0111001111000111 1011011000011100 0 -> sum: 0010100111100011, cout: 1

0001000001100111 0011000100001100 1 -> sum: 0100000101110100, cout: 0
1010111111010100 0111011000110011 0 -> sum: 0010011000000111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
